visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis should display months from January to December with a red plot line at the value 5.5. The y-axis should have labels styled with a font size of 12px and color #333333. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures with the series name 'Temperature' and data points corresponding to the given values. The chart should use custom colors ['#008000', '#FFA500'] for the series. Additionally, the chart should have a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis displays months from January to December and includes a red plot line at the value 5.5. The y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The data series represents monthly average temperatures with the series name 'Temperature' and corresponding data points. The chart uses custom colors ['#008000', '#FFA500'] for the series. Additionally, the chart has a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and margins set to 50 pixels on all sides. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly average temperatures.
